com.skye.lover.view.fresco.zoomable

类 DefaultZoomableController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skye.lover.view.fresco.zoomable.DefaultZoomableController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TransformGestureDetector.Listener, ZoomableController

    public class DefaultZoomableController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZoomableController, TransformGestureDetector.Listener
    Zoomable controller that calculates transformation based on touch events.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 com.skye.lover.view.fresco.zoomable.ZoomableController

        public android.graphics.PointF mapViewToImage(android.graphics.PointF viewPoint)
        Maps point from the view's to the image's relative coordinate system. This takes into account the zoomable transformation.
